original_title: Alexandre Astier - L'exoconférence (2015) - Ne Rien Trouver C'est Faire Une Decouverte
overview: During a session at the hairdressing salon, Alexandre Astier has a conversation on the subject of quantum physics with Étienne Klein.
title: Alexandre Astier - The exoconference (2015) - To find nothing is to make a discovery
